import React, { Component } from 'react'; import './home.css'; import Zoom from 'react-reveal/Zoom'; const timeImg = require( '../img/save-time.svg'); class Home extends Component { componentDidMount() { } render() { return ( <> {/*

Who we are?

Faceify may provide some interesting services which are related to the face recognition mechanism, like(take attendance of students, detect the strangers in a company, counting the presence people, ...etc.)

Why us?

OUR OBJECTIVES

  1. Facilitate the process of taking attendance from all web site.
  2. Make the taking attendance process reliable.
  3. Reduce the time needed to take attendance.
  4. Make it easy for teacher to review the history of class.
*/} ) } } export default Home;
